attributes.action: Education on Learning Difficulties Implemented Into PSHE Lessons.
attributes.additional_details:
In order to achieve this, ware currently wanting 500 signatures on our online petition.
Whilst it sounds like a large number, we have many platforms we are advertising on. Another one being our twitter page @NCSTalkBack. 

We will also be running a petition signing sessions which we will further update you about on the upcoming Thursday 30th July 2015. The location will be either High Wycombe or Slough,  which will be chosen at a later notice.
attributes.background:
This is our NCS campaign to raise awareness for the learning difficulties that people face.

We believe not everyone has a good knowledge about the various learning difficulties people encounter, which is why were trying to enforce this into a subject that's considered "facilitating".
